webapp.settings¶

Widget definition module: Defines sliders for adjusting system settings, namely PID tuning parameters and the ‘tick’ interval.

class webapp.settings.ConfigTab(**kwargs: Any)¶

Simple customised extension of ipywidgets.widgets.Accordion class, featuring a set of ControlSlider widgets as children.

Parameters:

config (dict, optional) – A dictionary of configuration parameters, defaults to appState.config

Returns:

ConfigTab object

Return type:

webapp.settings.ConfigTab

class webapp.settings.ControlSlider(**kwargs: Any)¶

_summary_ Simple customised extension of ipywidgets.widgets.FloatSlider class, builds in the required callback function for FloatSlider.observe, as handle_slider_change(self, change).

Parameters:

  • config (dict, optional) – A dictionary of configuration parameters, defaults to appState.config

  • target – Dictionary key for the parameter in config that the slider will control

Returns:

ConfigTab object

Return type:

webapp.settings.ConfigTab
